txt.en: Fertile soil can be found in the lowlands of North Ithilien to the west and south of Henneth Annûn.\n\nYou have gathered many seeds and should now plant them throughout North Ithilien.
Sap-bearing Trees can be found near the Field of Cormallen.\n\nHarvest the sap from North Ithilien trees.
Thurindol can be found in Henneth Annûn.\n\nYou have gathered a good quantity of tree-sap and should now return to Thurindol.
Plant the seeds in fertile soil in North Ithilien ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'This sap will prove invaluable as the key ingredient of my new vigour tonic. \n\n'You have helped ensure that the bodies and hearts of the brave Host will remain vigorous and spritely in the face of the Enemy.'
Planted seeds in fertile soil in North Ithilien ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The trees of North Ithilien are ripe with valuable sap which Thurindol believes can be made into a sustaining tonic for the soldiers.

'This sap will prove invaluable as the key ingredient of my new vigour tonic. \n\n'You have helped ensure that the bodies and hearts of the brave Host will remain vigorous and unweary in the face of the Enemy.'

'[placeholder], I have another valuable task for you.\n\n'The versatile flora is not all this region has to offer the willing herbalist. I noticed this morning that some trees have begun to bear a rather curious sap. Harvest this sap for me, and I may be able to formulate potent sustaining tonics for the impending march. There are many fine sap-bearing trees wreathing the Fields of Cormallen.'
